website_summaries.verdict: A powerful and very quiet product for the money, but takes some time to open and close.
pros: Has a 1-HP motor and direct drive which operates in near silence
cons: Opens and closes slowly compared to other models

customer_reviews.title: SOMMER customer service
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is great! SOMMER customer service -5 stars (minus 5 stars). Safety sensors not working so unable to try unit. SOMMER promised 3 times to send new ones out and never did. Product manual is more confusing than helpful! Uninstalled unit and returned opener to Amazon. supposed to be some advanced German product. Never had such poor customer service. If you need help you'll never be able to obtain. I provided my product delivery notice and they seemingly accused me of forging the paperwork. Why would I want sensors for a product I didn't own. Last time we communicated, was told sensors were back ordered. DON'T BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Biffers

customer_reviews.title: nothing but continued problems, and it was professionally installed
customer_reviews.text: bought this in early 2019 and nothing but continued problems, and it was professionally installed. worked right for one week after that, stop going all the way up or down, reset had it re-adjusted and still problems back to back...worst 250 dollars i have ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta MD

customer_reviews.title: Not your average opener!
customer_reviews.text: This made in Germany opener is virtually silent, runs smooth- your door is not being yanked either way. Unconventional design for sure, in that the motor moves down the track to push the door, and is gear drive with a DC motor. The obvious complaint would be that it operates slowly- if that is a problem to you. It is not from my perspective., so I give it 5 stars. Had it installed about 3 months now, no complaints or problems.
customer_reviews.author: Spiritgide

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed purchase...
customer_reviews.text: Too slow. Very hard to program for vehicles. remotes work intermittently. Tired contracting sommer directly, never responded to email support. Hard to get a hold of customer support. keypad for the outside is extra.tried this because of the reviews on the noise factor, would not recommend in the US.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: The local hardware store took care of that There is a YouTube video with great instructions on how to put it together
customer_reviews.text: This took me about 7 hours to install, since I did it by myself, and some parts were missing. The local hardware store took care of that There is a YouTube video with great instructions on how to put it together. My only complaint is that the Carriage Bolts should mount into a metal bracket instead of a plastic one.Other than that, this opener works great and is the quietest on the planet. Although not the fastest opener, it still meets our needs, and best of all, it comes with a lifetime warranty. Customer service is great too. make sure you read the instructions thoroughly since there has been a design change.
customer_reviews.author: BSG

customer_reviews.title: Just one major thing
customer_reviews.text: It turns out that 7 months ago California mandated that all automatic garage door openers must have battery backup (probably because of deadly wildfires). It would have been nice if they had a warning before I ordered it. I returned it unopened.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Farwood

customer_reviews.title: Great garage door opener
customer_reviews.text: Works well, a little slower but quieter than the old 3/4 HP opener that died. Different design was a curve ball for installer, with motor moving on the track that needs to have front toward the driveway. Bought another to replace other opener 6 monhs later.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: The quietest garage door opener ever!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Our old (very old) opener was SO LOUD. Our garage is under the house, so the noise could really carry. Especially while kids were napping. No one can believe how quiet this thing is. I can't hear it if I'm not really listening for it. The only sound is the noise from the door itself, and the rollers. The motor makes NO NOISE. None. I can't recommend it enough. It is slower than some doors, and the opener doesn't seem to have quite the range of some, but the peace and quiet more than make up for it. Installation can be a little tricky, and it takes a while, but we managed just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet but still occasional faults with a heavy door
customer_reviews.text: Extremely quiet, however as the highest HP opener I could find in the right price range I still get occasional faults with the my heavy wooden double door "bouncing" for a few seconds after opening or occasional re-opening by itself just as it finishes closing. This means we have to monitor the door closely, sadly eroding trust for this product.
customer_reviews.author: PenNameHere

customer_reviews.title: The best I’ve owned..
customer_reviews.text: What an excellent garage door opener. Extremely quite, which is how it was recommended. Easy installation, wonderfully engineered. I didn’t want a bulky noisey garage door opener. The builder for our new home offered a whatever brand that was noisey, bulky, and low hanging. This is a quite, smooth, easy to install option that is soace saving and easy to program. The remote openers are small and work well. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: READ THE YELLOW SHEET in the instructions!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the quietest garage door opener I've ever seen or heard. The instructions were very clear except for a revision involving a pin that was "missing"... There was a separate, loose, YELLOW page in the instructions (English on one side and Spanish on the other side) explaining a revised design that does not require a retaining pin. But, the page was on the front of the SPANISH Instruction Booklet with the Spanish side showing. Since I don't speak, read, or write Spanish, I ignored the yellow sheet. READ THE YELLOW SHEET!!!
customer_reviews.author: EddieLivin'

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: This unit is very quiet. It does run slower but the quiet makes up for it. ***The only problem we encounter was the wall station to open the door did not work. We had to buy a door bell button to open garage door.***not sure who to call to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: e
customer_reviews.text: Had difficulties with installation, tried to call Sommers USA multiple times (4 times technical support, then sales, then operator) only got a voice message not one call back.Totally unacceptable. What type of organization doesn't answer their phones.?
customer_reviews.author: D L

customer_reviews.title: Want unreliable opener, then buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: Okay its quiet, but have had nothing but problems , close door,comes back open. Make an adjustment, works for few days does same thing, make take 6 times up and down before it will stay closed. WORST purchase ever, Lemon, Junk
customer_reviews.author: Millers

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I got this
customer_reviews.text: This opener was very quiet and was pretty easy to install. We also installed new rollers on our door that helped a lot too. However, sometimes for no known reason the light keeps flashing when you open it. There is no way to get the light to stop flashing without shutting and reopening it. What a pain and it's VERY slow. 2 1/2 years later it has stopped working so now we have to replace the opener
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Very quite.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect opener when your bedroom is above the garage. Super quite. The openers are small and hard to push the button in the dark if you keep it on the visor. The light will not turn on if you walk through the sensors like other openers, but not an issue to me. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Garry Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good product, very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Good product, very quiet, appears durable but the lifetime warranty was the kicker. Installed 2 since I have 2 doors which took a few hours each. Not a seamless swap from the original chain drive openers due to layout differences but overall not too bad. First opener no issues out of the box just foreign parts which took getting used to. Second opener poor condition upon arrival and missing parts. Although I knowingly purchased as an open box it was in a lot worse condition than advertised. Both in and working so hopefully done with it for the foreseeable future
customer_reviews.author: dwilly

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have your own self tapping metal screws!
customer_reviews.text: The product came brand new in the box and was easy to set up. Everything went together nicely and I feel good about the craftsmanship and durability of my new opener! It was a little more difficult to assemble than the video made it look due mostly to how vague the written instructions are. If you don't know how to use tools, I would recommend hiring your neighbor at the very least. If you can change the brakes on your own car, you can install this door opener! Good luck DIY'ers
customer_reviews.author: James McCauley

customer_reviews.title: wonderfully quiet. Easy set-up for HomeLink car door opener
customer_reviews.text: Opener is what I hoped it would be. Installed myself. Instructions could be a bit clearer in spots but overall okay. Lifts effortlessly. Only sound I hear is the door itself. Otherwise, wonderfully quiet. Easy set-up for HomeLink car door opener. Buttons on remote device are a bit small. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vince S

customer_reviews.title: I Love Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I have a 4 car garage so I have bought/installed two of these units to replace the 30 year old doors. They are easy to put in place for my two 16' wide by 8' tall insulated overhead doors. The Sommer doors are so quite I am now able to "sneak out of the house" without disturbing anyone (LOL).
customer_reviews.author: Mooney Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Won't program with Homelink on 2018 Highlander or 2020 Tundra
customer_reviews.text: Unit was easy enough to install, and is the quietest opener I've ever encountered. The only downside is that it won't program to our Homelink transmitters. Called Sommer and was told to go to the Homelink.com website for instructions - that didn't work, so we're either left using the remotes, or buying an additional Homelink receiver. Never had that problem with a 20 year old Craftsman opener!
customer_reviews.author: Ted Browning

customer_reviews.title: Good door opener
customer_reviews.text: As I was replacing another opener I thought I could use some of the old parts, like the switch at the house door and the emergency breaker switch. After I replaced everything it works very well and is extremely quite.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Jauer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely quiet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great garage door opener. We had many problems in the past with our previous one as the door is very heavy. This one was a little difficult to install since we did have a previous opener--the reason for the 4 stars. It is very, very quiet. We had a visitor over and he thought we were opening it by hand! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install....used existing "old" mount for control/light module. Front rail mount was easy to mount as were safety infrared modules. Really love the almost silent motor and the best thing of all, my wife loves it!!! The only thing I would do to improve the whole arrangement is have a THIRD remote controller, to give to visitors when their in town!
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Tribble

customer_reviews.title: Hate the remotes
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the small buttons on the remote as you must search for it.ther are two buttons one for the light which is silly because the light comes on as the door opens anyway .The two buttons on the very small remote are a pain.I have no complaint whatsoever on the door opener itself or the installation.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Billings

customer_reviews.title: Dead quiet, easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged. Fasteners have common socket sizes - not metric. Clear instructions. Designed for minimal tool use. This opener is adjacent to my bedroom floor - can't hear anything when the door opens. Plenty of power. No bar grease, unlike chain/traditional opener designs. Remotes are a little hard to program for homelink devices.
customer_reviews.author: Stanltaaf

customer_reviews.title: is was easy to install and started right up
customer_reviews.text: it is extremely quiet. is was easy to install and started right up. their are only two downsides, it is twice as slow as my chain drive right next to it and the range of the remote is horrible. but my daughter's bedroom is right above the garage and this does not wake her up when I leave in the morning
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. Mulder

customer_reviews.title: So quiet and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Wow easy to install. Can use some of previous opener hardware if desired. So quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet. Works great. Took several hours to install, but my husband and I did it ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria M.

customer_reviews.title: Holy Crap!
customer_reviews.text: No one knows your home because of the garage door anymore. The two Golden Retrievers are shocked when you open the door to the house - they never heard the garage door. The house was built in the 70's with a one piece garage door (no hinges just 4 rollers). Not sure if all "direct drives" are this quiet but it was one of those "Holy Crap" that was a great purchase moments. It has been up for 8 months. Replace an old chain driven Craftsman (that I had rebuilt the worm gear on a few years back)
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and powerful. Has no problem handling my 8by 16 steel door. This is my second one and love both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Merrill Marley

customer_reviews.title: Quiet ! Solid and well designed.
customer_reviews.text: No reason to ever buy the cable, belt or chain openers again. Will buy another>
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: It's so quiet! And is strong enough to pull ...
customer_reviews.text: It's so quiet! And is strong enough to pull up our very old and heavy solid wood garage door.
customer_reviews.author: objective individual

customer_reviews.title: An amazing difference in how quiet it is versus our original ...
customer_reviews.text: An amazing difference in how quiet it is versus our original opener. It is a little slower, but the speed hasn't caused me any problems and don't think it will. Setup was easy enough. The Homelink connection is still challenging us but we haven't given up.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Porter

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The remote control not working well for opening and close the door.Do you have any idea can help fixing.
customer_reviews.author: luoli

customer_reviews.title: I like this opener and I am glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent garage door opener. Works well and I have no issues with it. I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice technology
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it after one month. It's a bit slow but very quiet. I got the 1HP because I have a large heavy door. It handles it with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Some Reveiwer

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet operation!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, test & operate. I love, love the quiet operation of the opener - kids will not be disturbed anymore.
customer_reviews.author: J customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet. Remote range needs some improvement. Install easy. Minimal tools needed. I do recommend it. Wish it had the wifi option. I will be looking for it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great opener
customer_reviews.text: QUIET! The opener was easy to install for anyone with a ladder and minimal mechanical skills. The obstruction sensors were really easy to align. Over all this opener is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: earl j reese

customer_reviews.title: nice and quiet
customer_reviews.text: So far I was only familiar with noisy chain driven Garage Door Openers. So I am very pleased this Direct Drive Opener is so quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Norbert W.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and very quiet
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be an excellent unit. I wanted a heavy duty unit since it is raising an oversized door. I am amazed at how quiet the operation is. So far I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Schrock

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy to install and no comparison to my old chain ...
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to install and no comparison to my old chain drive. It's quiet and positive operation in both directions is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Austin

customer_reviews.title: Impressed - buying another
customer_reviews.text: Great garage door opener, took a little longer to install than just changing out the old opener with the same brand. I'm buying a second for the other door!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy B.

customer_reviews.title: Love mine,  one drawback.
customer_reviews.text: Only drawback is it opens slower than most other drives. I love it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Army Dude

customer_reviews.title: At last a quiet opener.
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet unit. My only compliant has to do with their Homelink programming which can leave you scratching your head.
customer_reviews.author: William D Elliott

customer_reviews.title: quiet
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation. Door is very quiet a little slow but that's ok with me..
customer_reviews.author: Greg Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Great opener
customer_reviews.text: This is my third purchase of Sommer door openers. Bought the 1hp model this time for an old double wide wood door. They never cease to amaze people on how quiet they are. A bit slower than others but worth it. Very low profile and easy to install. Great product !
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Nicholas Platt

customer_reviews.title: They are really good openers, the photo ets can be touchy
customer_reviews.text: They are really good openers, the photo ets can be touchy. If the photo eys were a little better and the wall console was a bit nicer I would give a 5 star. They did improve how the power head attaches to the rail.

customer_reviews.title: carefully read the instructions
customer_reviews.text: runs smoothly and is much quieter than our other brand opener.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Harrison

customer_reviews.title: It's quiet
customer_reviews.text: Best product on the market. Only complaint is that opens and closes slow.
customer_reviews.author: Moeman

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for oversized doors
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and easily installed. Handles my oversize double steel door without complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A. McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quiet. Assemby a bit funky to figure out. Be patient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and silent as the wind. No more Genie mind numbing wailing grinding sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G. P. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: Due to changes I've made in my garage, my installation is not "typical". My door no longer comes up and back, but rather follows the pitch of my roof. this doesn't allow the weight of the door to ever "release" from the opener. the 1hp motor was what i needed for this application, and it performs flawlessly! Setup and installation was pretty simple as well once i found the correct set of instructions (it comes with several sets in different languages). After going through the "learning" cycles and synching the remotes, this opener performs as well/if not better than i hoped it would!
customer_reviews.author: Shane J Zerbe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far it is very good, online video is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Installation was uncomplicated; other reviewers have commented that it is slow, and it is slower than our previous one, but not a problem at all and very pleased with how quiet it is. Clearly a well made product and we could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: LLAZ1ST

customer_reviews.title: The best garage door opener
customer_reviews.text: The best garage door opener, it's quiet and moves smoothly. I was amazed how well it functions. Better than what I had at my old house.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Traore

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased High Quality
customer_reviews.text: The installation was straightforward, I needed to order an extension kit ($54) since my door is 9ft high and it wasn't until I had most of it together that I came across this fact in the instructions. The Sommer website had the extension kit and they shipped very quickly. The unit is incredibly quiet and has a very high quality feel to it. The door opens slowly but that is a non issue as far as I am concerned. I will be buying a second unit for door number two.
customer_reviews.author: boots944

customer_reviews.title: Solid, remarkable, easy to install opener
customer_reviews.text: This is the best opener I have ever used, period. Quiet, super easy to install and it is fun to watch go up and down, I know, I sound a little simple, but this is an amazing piece of equipment. Strongly recommend purchasing, and one last thing-- it is a little slower, but I hit the button going into the garage, and by the time I am opening the car door the garage door is almost completely up. Unless your line of work insists that you have speedy getaways.. this door is for you.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Two months later
customer_reviews.text: Open / closes a little slow but works very well, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: Great door opener.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with the ease of installation and quality of this product. It is much quieter than any competitive opener on the market. I have this installed on an 18' insulated and hurricane reinforced door, whish makes it much heavier than conventional metal door. The wife and I are very pleased with this opener and would recommend it to everyone. you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mopar

customer_reviews.title: IT WAS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: VERY EASY TO INSTALL. I HAVE INSTALLED SEVERAL DIFFERENT NAMED BRANDS BEFORE BUT THIS ONE IS BY FAR THE FASTEST & EASTEST TO DO.
customer_reviews.author: GARY THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Buy this, you'll love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE garage opener. We've had one for years and recently bought this for our daughter. It's so quiet and smooth! Very easy to install. We've never needed to use the customer service, so I can't speak to that. We have a heavy double garage door and the 3/4 horse handles it with no problem. Got my daughter the 1.0 horse just because the price was cheaper than the 3/4.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!!! This garage door opener is quiet, albeit a bit slow. The transmitter works from the end of the drive, approximately 250 feet. Purchased the keypad seperately. Had it installed by Amazon. Well worth the price. I couldn't be hqppier!
customer_reviews.author: Two Cents

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: The opener came with a quick guide for assembly and also in the operation and installation manual. Quick set-up and easy to install. The opener is very quiet and smooth operating. The only downfall is it opens and closes a little slower than most openers.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E Dillman

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatible with HomeLink!!!
customer_reviews.text: Although this opener very quiet - it is the slowest garage door opener on earth! Like 2X as slow as a Chamberlin when opening & closing the garage door. The other major issue is that it is NOT compatible with HomeLink in most vehicles! Don't be misled by the info in the description or their website - it simply does not work with Homelink! German cars, American cars and Japanese cars - I have tried them all - and all version of instructions supplied by Sommer Do Not Work!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very Quiet Garage Door Opener
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazingly quiet garage door opener. It is a little slower than other garage door openers, but very quiet. As I was installing it I kept admiring the engineering, it is a nicely engineered product. The instructions were easy to follow, and installation was straight forward. I didn't have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff1975

customer_reviews.title: Like the product and it is super quiet
customer_reviews.text: Like the product and it is super quiet. It does not move fast, but i can live with it since it is super quiet. I am rating this as a 2, only because the motor cover was cracked. I have no idea how this would have passed a quality control process
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and quiet garage door opener
customer_reviews.text: I now have three of these installed in two locations and they have been perfectly reliable. Installation is pretty straightforward if you are switching this in to replace an existing garage door opener. The only thing to be aware of is that this may need some additional length of steel strap to install vs most other garage door openers due to the way the straps attach to the sides of the rail bracket instead of to the head end. You'll only really notice this during a retrofit if the original strap is too short, during a new install you'll be cutting it to the correct length anyway. Once in place, it stays quiet and just does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

product_meta.title: SOMMER 1052V000 Direct Drive 1.0 hp Quiet, Durable and Strong Garage Door Opener
product_meta.description: Quiet. Durable. Strong. Garage door operation simplified. The Direct Drive garage door opener is the only one of its kind which offers Europe's leading innovative technology. Unlike conventional garage door opener that use a noisy chain, belt or screw the Direct Drive has only one moving part. The motor glides silently along the chain which is embedded in a sturdy steel rail. Extremely quiet garage door opener with virtually no vibrations. Perfect for homes with living spaces above the garage. Very smooth operation with soft start and stop technology. Because the motor is located at the door instead of the back of the opener it maximizes the power.
feature_bullets: Premium heavy duty 1 HP motor for maximum performance
Incl. rail for 7 ft. - 8 ft. door height/full installation kit included
Extremely quiet garage door opener with virtually no vibrations; Perfect for homes with living spaces above the garage
Includes two x 2-button transmitters and interior wall station
Secure Rolling Code Technology, Home Link Compatible
